files.patch:
@@ -46,3 +46,0 @@
-  elif test "x$ENABLE_HEADLESS_ONLY" = xtrue; then
-    # No X11 support needed when building headless only
-    NEEDS_LIB_X11=false
@@ -50,1 +47,2 @@
-    # All other instances need X11
+    # All other instances need X11, even if building headless only, libawt still
+    # needs X11 headers.
